english: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
chinese: 行动的障碍推动行动。阻挡道路的，就是道路。
author: Marcus Aurelius

english: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
chinese: 你能控制的是你的内心，而不是外在事件。认清这一点，你就会找到力量。
author: Marcus Aurelius

english: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
chinese: 不要再浪费时间争论一个好人应该是什么样了。去做一个好人。
author: Marcus Aurelius

english: He who fears death will never do anything worthy of a man who is alive.
chinese: 害怕死亡的人，永远做不出哪怕一件真正活着的人该做的事。
author: Seneca

english: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don’t have.
chinese: 没有人能拥有他们想要的一切，但他们有能力不去渴望他们没有的东西。
author: Seneca

english: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
chinese: 首先问自己想成为什么样的人，然后去做你该做的事。
author: Epictetus

english: It’s not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
chinese: 重要的不是发生了什么，而是你如何应对。
author: Epictetus

english: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
chinese: 财富不在于拥有很多，而在于渴望很少。
author: Epictetus

english: Man is not worried by real problems so much as by his imagined anxieties about real problems.
chinese: 让人烦恼的往往不是真正的问题，而是对问题的想象与焦虑。
author: Epictetus

english: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.
chinese: 如果不正确，就不要做；如果不真实，就不要说。
author: Marcus Aurelius
